resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108770</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108770</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206154</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Citizen Kurchatov: Stalin's Bombmaker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bürger Kurchatov: Bombmaker Stalins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Citoyen Kurchatov : Bombmaker de Stalin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cidadão Kurchatov: Bombmaker De Stalin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cittadino Kurchatov: Bombmaker Dello Stalin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολίτης Kurchatov: Bombmaker του Στάλιν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudadano Kurchatov: Bombmaker De Stalin</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tells the story of a complex, world-class physicist who became the driving force the Soviet Union's race to develop the atomic and hydrogen bomb.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt die Geschichte eines Komplexes, 
Welt-Kategorie Physiker, der Antriebskraft das Rennen des 
Sowjet-Anschlußes wurde, um die Atom- und Wasserstoffbombe zu 
entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dit l'histoire d'un complexe, le physicien de 
monde-classe qui est devenu la force d'entraînement la course 
d'Union Soviétique pour développer la bombe à hydrogène atomique et.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diz a história de um complexo, o físico da 
mundo-classe que se transformou dirigir a força a raça da 
Soviete-união para desenvolver a bomba atômica e de hidrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dice alla storia di un complesso, fisico del 
mondo-codice categoria che si è transformato in nell'azionamento in 
della forza la corsa dell'Soviet-unione per sviluppare la bomba 
all'idrogeno ed atomica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέει την ιστορία ενός σύνθετου, παγκόσμιας ποιότητας
φυσικού που έγινε η κατευθυντήρια δύναμη η φυλή της Σοβιετικής 
Ένωσης για να αναπτύξει την ατομική και βόμβα υδρογόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuenta la historia de un complejo, el físico de 
la mundo-clase que hizo impulsor la fuerza la raza de la Soviet-unio'n
para desarrollar la bomba de hidrógeno atómica y.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206154</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108770</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/citizen-kurchatov-stalins-bombmaker</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
